summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from October 1, 2014, to October 31, 2014. It details various incoming and outgoing transactions, including transfers and interest payments, highlighting significant amounts associated with individuals and entities.

persons.name: Leon D. Black
persons.context: Leon D. Black is mentioned as a recipient of incoming funds in the account transactions.

persons.name: Debra R. Black
persons.context: Debra R. Black is mentioned alongside Leon D. Black as a recipient of incoming funds.

connections.description: Leon D. Black and Debra R. Black are associated as account holders in the transactions.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: A transfer of $7,000,000.00 was received from Leon D. Black and Debra R. Black.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: A transfer of $2,000,000.00 was received from Apollo Management.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $10,197.41 was credited to the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $68,424,973.81 on October 1, 2014.
Significant incoming transfers included $7,000,000.00 and $13,000,000.00 from Leon D. Black and Debra R. Black.
The account experienced various outgoing transfers totaling significant amounts, including $1,190,000.00 in debits.
The ending balance as of October 31, 2014, was $92,245,171.22.
There are multiple references to transactions involving Apollo Management and Black Family Partners, L.P.
